full_summary:
### **Government Tender Announcement: Prefabricated Industrial Buildings**
### **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### **Solicitation Number:** WS4596978679
#### **Modification Number:** 2
#### **Publication Date:** May 30, 2024
#### **Closing Date and Time:** June 20, 2024, 2:00 PM
#### **Delivery Regions:** Québec

**Contracting Entity and End-User Information**
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND) / Ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN)

**Description of Goods or Services**
Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the construction of prefabricated industrial buildings, inclusive of delivery and installation.

**Trade Agreements**
This solicitation is governed by the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), as well as other active trade agreements (see technical specification document).

**Procurement Method**
This is a competitive solicitation with an open bidding process.

**Selection Criteria**
Bidder responses will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

**Contact Information**
Inquiries may be addressed to:
Julien Ratte (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: [Not Specified] E-mail: [julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Tender Information**
Peruse the solicitation document for further details on solicitation requirements and submission guidelines.
Access the notice through [this link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19867918?extsite=MTk4Njc5MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 

CNST
ophone requests will be accommodated if possible prior to closing
Submission of bids is public and can be subject to disclosure.  
**Free Trade Agreements:** Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement; Canadian Free Trade Agreement; Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership; Agreement on Government Procurement--World Trade Organization
